ISSUE.TITLE: Trouble authenticating with Github Enterprise (unknown authority)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I am running into this issue when trying to authenticate: ``` Post https://git.local/login/oauth/access_token: x509: certificate signed by unknown authority ``` I think it's probably because internally we use self-signed certificates. I'd love to dig in to the source to try and fix this, but I'm not sure where to begin. Any pointers would be appreciated. Perhaps a configuration param could be set on the settings page, or a checkbox for "trust invalid certificates" could be added. Michael
